name: startuporpharma.com
description: Game to guess if company name is a startup or a pharmaceutical drug

scripts.build: NODE_PATH=./src ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/client.js -o public/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
